library(tidyverse)

# Read data story
```{r}

diabetes = read.csv("diabetes.csv")
glimpse(diabetes)
diabetes$Outcome = as.factor(diabetes$Outcome)
glimpse(diabetes)
library(ggfortify)
library(ggplot2)
dia.aov = lm(Outcome~., data= diabetes)
autoplot(dia.aov, which= 1:2)

```
